## ResourceManagerBuilder.getResourcesForContext() method

Gets a read-only array of all [resource builders](./ts-res.resources.resourcebuilder.md) that have at least one candidate that can match the supplied context.

**Signature:**

```typescript
getResourcesForContext(context: Context.IValidatedContextDecl, options?: Context.IContextMatchOptions): ReadonlyArray<ResourceBuilder>;
```

</th><th>

</td><td>

[Context.IValidatedContextDecl](./ts-res.context.ivalidatedcontextdecl.md)


</td><td>

The [context](./ts-res.context.ivalidatedcontextdecl.md) to match against.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

options


</td><td>

[Context.IContextMatchOptions](./ts-res.context.icontextmatchoptions.md)


</td><td>

_(Optional)_ [options](./ts-res.context.icontextmatchoptions.md) for the context match.


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>

**Returns:**

ReadonlyArray&lt;[ResourceBuilder](./ts-res.resources.resourcebuilder.md)<!-- -->&gt;

A read-only array of [resource builders](./ts-res.resources.resourcebuilder.md) with matching candidates.
